body.head.byline: By Laurie J. Flynn (NYT) (Compiled by Alan Krauss)

abstract.p: Blue Martini Software Inc, maker of customer relationship applications, says Sprint will use Blue Martini software to help manage and expand SprintPCS.com e-commerce Web site; graph (S)

block.p: Blue Martini Software Inc., a maker of customer relationship applications, said Sprint would use Blue Martini software to help manage and expand the SprintPCS.com e-commerce Web site, adding to a customer list that also includes Levi Strauss, Harley-Davidson and Stanford University. Currently, SprintPCS customers can log onto the SprintPCS.com site to buy service plans and merchandise, manage their accounts and get technical support. Blue Martini's software will extend those capabilities by adding personalization and advanced commerce features, as well as improved customer service.
